body.first_text: Passionate about learning, improving, and growing.
body.third_text: Ready to collaborate on innovative projects.

card_info.my_description: I specialize in creating complete web applications, from designing attractive interfaces to implementing robust backend solutions. My focus is on delivering high-quality products that not only meet technical requirements but also offer an exceptional user experience.
card_info.skills_description: From SinglePage to applications with backend integration. Working with modern and scalable technologies to provide complete solutions that are easy to maintain and ready for real users.
card_info.ux_ui_description: Developing is not just writing code, it's creating experiences. Passionate about UI/UX design, I strive to create responsive, intuitive, and attractive interfaces that not only work well but also look good.

my_self.title: DEVELOPER
my_self.my_self_text: I am a developer passionate about turning ideas into digital experiences.
my_self.about_me_description: Full stack developer with over 2 years of experience, both frontend and backend. Graduated as a Computer Programming Analyst and currently pursuing a Software Development Engineering degree, which allows me to deepen my knowledge in architecture, best practices, and technical leadership.
my_self.about_me_description2: I am motivated by learning, solving complex problems, and collaborating in a team to deliver quality products. I aim to continue growing in environments where I can provide value through efficient and scalable solutions.
